title: ISADORA, LAB WHITE SAPPHIRE AND NANO CRYSTAL EMERALD GOLD RIVIÈRE NECKLACE
description: Isadora features a graduating silhouette of lab-grown white sapphires and nano crystal emeralds, set in 4-prong 18k gold vermeil.
details:
Metal: 18K gold vermeil - a 2.5 micron layer of gold over sterling silver. 

Setting: 4-prong 
Stone Type: Lab-grown white sapphire and nano crystal emerald 
Stone Shape: Round cut




  15 inches, 14.2 CTW DEW lab-grown white sapphire, 3 CTW DEW nano crystal emerald 

16 inches, 14.5 CTW DEW lab-grown white sapphire, 3 CTW DEW nano crystal emerald 

18 inches, 15.1 CTW DEW lab-grown white sapphire, 3 CTW DEW nano crystal emerald 


What is Lab-Grown?
